title: Where is the 2026 budget?
description:
Nigeria’s 2026 budget is missing, derailing the fiscal calendar and exposing deep structural failures. Learn about the chaos and its impact on development.

Read More: https://punchng.com/where-is-the-2026-budget-2/
content: NIGERIAS budget system is once again in disarray. With just four weeks to end the 2025 fiscal year, the 2026 federal budget has yet to be presented. This exposes deep structural failures that threate… [+8601 chars]
